buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases for all units even if Paladin is in the Time Shop (5-star 5 levels, 6 star 10 levels, Max 50 levels).
buffs.name: Spirit Awakening 2

hidden_abilites: Increases basic speed of the game by 7%.
Increases self movement speed and attack speed by 10%.
Increases movement speed of all soldiers by 7% and critical damage by 9%.
Damage and critical damage chance against enemy crystal increased greatly.
[Spirit Awakening 2 Limit Break]: Increases value by 5 per 6-star Paladin, up to 25.
description.skill1: Increases the cap of Offline Limit Break (0.4%, 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.6%, 2%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Paladin ]
